ProductInfo.Features:
Ultra-fast f/1.4 Leica DC-Vario-Summilux 3.8x Zoom Lens: The ultra-fast Leica DC-Vario-Summilux f/1.4 sets a milestone for compact digital cameras with outstanding speed throughout its entire range of focal lengths from 24 to 90 mm (35mm equivalent)
1/1.7" CMOS sensor: The combination of the 10.1MP CMOS sensor and a high-performance Leica lens enables capture of high-contrast, brilliant, detailed images and natural colors. The image processor maintains ISO sensitivities from 80 to 12800
Full 1080p HD Video: Thanks to the sensor, Full 1080p HD AVCHD and internet friendly MP4 video capture is now supported by the D-Lux 6
Fast Continuous Shooting: The burst speed of the D-Lux 6 is 12 frames per second at 10.1MP resolution
High-resolution 3.0" LCD: The resolution of the D-Lux 6 LCD is 920,000 pixels. Even in bright sunlight, the display provides excellent playback quality. In addition, the various format sizes are displayed in recording and playback mode
ProductInfo.Name: Leica D-Lux 6 Digital Camera, 10.1MP, 3.8x Optical/4x Digital Zoom, 1080p Video, f/1.4-2.3 Leica Lens, Glossy Black / Silver
